channel.title: Distributed-Systems on Systology
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed-Systems on Systology

item.title: Background Job Queue for Big Tasks
item.description: Asynchronous job queue design for resource-heavy tasks (video encoding, data processing) with retries, idempotency, DLQ handling, and autoscaling.

item.title: Distributed Caching Layer for VCS
item.description: Design a distributed cache to reduce I/O and speed up VCS operations by caching objects and hashes with high concurrency and low latency.

item.title: Distributed Web Crawler
item.description: Design for a Google-scale web crawler focusing on Breadth-First Search (BFS), DNS resolution caching, robots.txt politeness, and handling duplicate or malicious domains.

item.title: Flash Sale / Ticketmaster
item.description: Design for handling extreme bursts of traffic where limited inventory must be distributed fairly and consistently under heavy load.

item.title: Notification System
item.description: Design of a high-throughput notification service supporting push, email, and SMS with prioritization, rate limiting, and delivery tracking.

item.title: Payment System
item.description: Design of a scalable payment gateway integration and internal ledger system ensuring idempotency, strict consistency, and failure recovery.

item.title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning Platform
item.description: Platform design for federated learning that trains across devices without sharing raw data, with secure aggregation and privacy safeguards.

item.title: URL Shortener & Pastebin
item.description: Design for a highly available, read-heavy service bridging short aliases to long URLs, focusing on Base62 encoding, Snowflake IDs, and collision avoidance.
